statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 6 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ 13 \\ 9 \\ 5 \\ -22 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
